resources.string:
The App uses a sliding panel menu using navigation Drawer in which we combine Drawerlayout and Naviagtionview.On selecting the desired option desired fragment is opened.
Home Screen:
It has a search section,where the user searches for Artists or Songs from the SoundCloud.The rest of the screen has different music styles categories.Each category has a horizontal scroll view of albums.
On clicking on any of the albums an explicit intent is called to the Tracks screen.

Recents:
A custom Adapter with a new class which contains an imageview and 2 textviews will be used for listview of songs.On the bottom of the page there is a draggable sliding up panel to another view-Now Playing screen.There are three buttons for play,next,previous if the view is collapsed.
Implemented library: Android sliding Up panel.
It will be used Exoplayer library for implementing the Mediaplayer.

PlayLists:\nIt has a gridview with a custom adapter with a new class which contains an imageview and a textview.\nClick on any of the following playlists.Each of them uses Explicit intent to the next Activity-Tracks screen

Genre:\nIt has a gridview with a custom adapter with a new class which contains 2 imageviews and a textview.\nClick on any of the following playlists.Each of them uses Explicit intent to the next Activity-Tracks screen

Radio:\nIt will contain a media player that streams music from the cloud.Library for streaming music: RadioPlayerService.\nBelow you will see an image of a radio.At the bottom of the screen it has 3 buttons for play,next and previous
Now Playing:\nIt has an image of the Album and a seekbar and 3 buttons for play,next,previous.\nIt will be used ExoPlayer Library for implementing the MediaPlayer.

Tracks:
A custom Adapter with a new class which contains an imageview and 2 textviews will be used for listview of songs.On the bottom of the page there is a draggable sliding up panel to another view-Now Playing screen.There are three buttons for play,next,previous if the view is collapsed.
Implemented library: Android sliding Up panel.
It will be used Exoplayer library for implementing the Mediaplayer.
